topic.title: Medication Action Plan Activity - conformance rules

section.p:
The medication action plan activity describes the specific action that the patient is to take or has taken.
(What I need to do)
MAP 6

ol.li: SHALL conform to Consol Plan Of Care Activity Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.39)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="INT" , where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Plan of Care moodCode (Act/Encounter/Procedure) 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.23 STATIC (CONF:8539)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text
WHAT I NEED TO DO
Enter recommendations on what the beneficiary should be doing (e.g., Check your blood pressure every morning. Record your blood pressure reading in your log book.). In some cases, it may be appropriate to tell the beneficiary to take no action pending outcome of the MTM provider's follow up with the physician or other practitioner.
See MAP 6
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT)
SHALL conform to Consol Plan Of Care Activity Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.39)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="INT" , where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Plan of Care moodCode (Act/Encounter/Procedure) 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.23 STATIC (CONF:8539)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8539)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text
WHAT I NEED TO DO
Enter recommendations on what the beneficiary should be doing (e.g., Check your blood pressure every morning. Record your blood pressure reading in your log book.). In some cases, it may be appropriate to tell the beneficiary to take no action pending outcome of the MTM provider's follow up with the physician or other practitioner.
See MAP 6
